original_text: Because the two women respected God, he was kind to them. The Israelite people continued to grow in number. They became very strong.
korean_text: 하나님이 그 산파들에게 은혜를 베푸시니 그 백성은 번성하고 매우 강해지니라

sentences.original_text: Because the two women respected God
The Israelite people continued to grow in number
